explains: n. （尤指广播、电视信号）发射机，发射台；传播者，传递媒介；（生理）神经传递素
wordGroup: pressure transmitter 压力变送器；压力传送器
radio transmitter 无线电广播发射机
optical transmitter 光发送机；光透射器
level transmitter 能级传送器；液面传感器；物位变送器
flow transmitter 流量变送器；流量传送仪；流量传感器

sentences.en: Rather than plugging a cable into a shoe, the Wisconsin researchers suggest installing a wireless transmitter in the heel.
sentences.cn: 威斯康星州的研究人员用安装在脚后跟的无线发射机取代了需要塞进鞋子里的数据线。

sentences.en: Emphasis was placed on the school as a transmitter of moral values.
sentences.cn: 人们强调学校为道德价值观的传输者。

sentences.en: Sensors record each movement and send it by an ankle transmitter to a smart phone.
sentences.cn: 传感器记录下每个动作，然后通过脚踝传感器发送到智能手机上。
